law.catch_line: Authority to share information from registrations.
law.text: The cabinet may share information gathered pursuant to KRS 17.510 with law enforcement agencies of this state, other states, and the federal government in the course of their official duties.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 392, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994.
